levels.description: Basics (Code Complete): concise commenting, intermediate variables, no long functions, well-factored self-documenting code, eslint is setup
SOLID principals, knows popular eslint configs, and what eslint rules to break
Has worked on larger code base with multiple developers, to see/participate in larger code base organization across multiple team
Has worked on a project over a long period with multiple developers, to see common pitfalls and what is actually practical and maintainable
